data.title: Thorntondale Road, Scawsby, South Yorkshire, DN5 8SL,
data.meta_description: Explore Thorntondale Road  Scawsby. Discover historic maps, local crime rates, house prices, and more. Join the community to share memories and get local insights
data.text:
About Thorntondale Road

Thorntondale Road is a street located in the village of Scawsby. It uses the postcode DN5 8SL. The street has a length of approximately 142 metres.

The street is publicly maintained which means that the road is adopted and Doncaster is responsible for the repair and upkeep of the highway.

The street is located within the Doncaster District (B) Council's jurisdiction. They provide various services, like refuse collection, and manage council tax collection. It's situated in the Yorkshire and The Humber region of the UK.

The road has been assigned the Unique Street Reference Number of 11200794 in the National Street Gazetteer.

It is located within the county of South Yorkshire, situated in the Yorkshire and The Humber region of the UK. It's 147.94 miles North from central London., 1.96 miles North West from Doncaster, 16.19 miles North East from Sheffield and 23.52 miles South East from Leeds.
